actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill authorizing a project for beach erosion control and hurricane protection at the Panama City Beaches, Fla.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of Engineers, to undertake the advanced design and engineering phase of the project for beach erosion control and hurricane-flood protections at Panama City Beaches in Florida, at an estimated cost of $165,000.

titles.title: A bill authorizing a project for beach erosion control and hurricane protection at the Panama City Beaches, Fla.
